author: Wzyss
install_msg: Thank you for installing Counting! Use `[p]help countingset` to see available commands.
name: Counting
short: Count upwards in channels with optional math expressions.
description: Allows members to count upwards in configured channels. Members can use numbers or math expressions (e.g., '1+1' for 2). Starts at 1 and can have an optional goal. Prevents the same user from counting twice in a row.
